scripts.build:functions:lint: cd functions && npm install && npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build:public: cpx "static/**/*.*" dist/public/static && cpx "dist/functions/_next/static/**/*.*" dist/public/_next/static && cpx "dist/functions/_next/serverless/pages/**/*.*" dist/public/
scripts.copy:deps: cpx "*{package.json,package-lock.json}" dist/functions && cd dist/functions && npm install
scripts.firebase:build: npm run clean && npm run build:functions && npm run build && npm run build:public && npm run copy:deps
scripts.firebase:serve: npm run firebase:build && firebase serve --only hosting
scripts.firebase:deploy: npm run firebase:build && firebase deploy --only hosting
